name: Buns For Buns
description:
Requirements to play: 

  • 'Buns' file placed into 'C:\windows\system32' (allows for images to be loaded)
  • Python installed

Controls:

ActionButtonUsageLeftA / Left Arrowmove Big Bun left
RightD / Right Arrowmove Big Bun rightJumpSpace / Up Arrowmake Big Bun jumpDashLeft Click / Down Arrowmove Big Bun faster after jumping
